pkgmetadata.longdescription: HL7apy: a lightweight Python library to parse, create and handle HL7 v2.x messages----------------------------------------------------------------------------------HL7apy is a lightweight Python package to intuitively handle `HL7 <http://www.hl7.org>`_ v2 messages according to HL7 specifications.The main features includes: * Message parsing * Message creation * Message validation following the HL7 xsd specifications * Access to elements by name, long name or position * Support to all simple and complex datatypes * Encoding chars customization * Message encoding in ER7 format and compliant with MLLP protocol
